Uses of Interface
org.deeplearning4j.spark.time.TimeSource

  • Packages that use TimeSource 
    Package Description
    org.deeplearning4j.spark.time  

    • Uses of TimeSource in org.deeplearning4j.spark.time

      Classes in org.deeplearning4j.spark.time that implement TimeSource 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NTPTimeSource
      A TimeSource that utilize Network Time Protocol to determine the system clock offset
      Instances should be obtained via NTPTimeSource.getInstance() or TimeSourceProvider; one instance may be used per machine
      Specifically, the implementation uses Apache Commons Net (already a dependency in Spark) to query a NTP server.
      class  SystemClockTimeSource
      A TimeSource implementation that is identical to calling System.currentTimeMillis()
      Methods in org.deeplearning4j.spark.time that return TimeSource 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TimeSource TimeSourceProvider.getInstance()
      Get a TimeSource the default TimeSource instance (default: NTPTimeSource
      static TimeSource SystemClockTimeSource.getInstance() 
      static TimeSource NTPTimeSource.getInstance() 
      static TimeSource TimeSourceProvider.getInstance(String className)
      Get a specific TimeSource by class name
